Key Match Events: India’s final Group A match at the 2024 T20 World Cup on Saturday was abandoned without a ball being bowled due to wet outfield, with both the teams awarded a point each.
India finish the group stages with 7 points and at the top of the table while Canada finish with three points from four matches – having previously defeated Ireland.
Miscellaneous Highlights: With incessant rains in Lauderhill, Florida, the fate of the game was hanging by a thread already and despite the weather being clear by the time of the toss, the outfield wasn’t cleared for a game by the match officials.
The game, even if it would’ve went ahead, wasn’t going to affect the next round as India and USA had already confirmed qualification for Super-8.
